name: Helicopter (DemonGyro)
description:
Inspired by Nokia 3310 Jam 3, I decided to remake an old phone game fondly remembered with zero reference and all the memory I could muster.

All assets were created by me, including the audio and text.

It's not much, but its a completed game! I hope someone enjoys it, and feel free to suggest any improvements.

Controls:

  • Spacebar: Confirm, Missile
  • W or Up: Move helicopter up
  • S or Down: Move helicopter down

Current Version: v0.1.0

Supported Platforms:

  • Windows
